thread.title: Undisciplined Bills unravel in 24-10 loss to Giants
thread.title_full: Undisciplined Bills unravel in 24-10 loss to Giants

author: JOHN WAWROW
title: Undisciplined Bills unravel in 24-10 loss to Giants
text:
Bill Wippert Undisciplined Bills unravel in 24-10 loss to Giants 
New York Giants running back Rashad Jennings, right, breaks a tackle attempt by Buffalo Bills outside linebacker Nigel Bradham on his way to score a touchdown run during the second half of an NFL football game, Sunday, Oct. 4, 2015, in Orchard Park, N.Y. (AP Photo/Bill Wippert) Gary Wiepert Undisciplined Bills unravel in 24-10 loss to Giants 
Buffalo Bills defensive end Mario Williams (94) drives New York Giants running back Rashad Jennings (23) to the ground during a tackle in the second half of an NFL football game, Sunday, Oct. 4, 2015, in Orchard Park, N.Y. (AP Photo/Gary Wiepert) Gary Wiepert Undisciplined Bills unravel in 24-10 loss to Giants 
Buffalo Bills running back Karlos Williams, center, is tackled by New York Giants players during the first half of an NFL football game, Sunday, Oct. 4, 2015, in Orchard Park, N.Y. (AP Photo/Gary Wiepert) Bill Wippert Undisciplined Bills unravel in 24-10 loss to Giants 
New York Giants wide receiver Dwayne Harris, front, is tackled by Buffalo Bills defensive back Nickell Robey during the first half of an NFL football game, Sunday, Oct. 4, 2015, in Orchard Park, N.Y. (AP Photo/Bill Wippert) Gary Wiepert Undisciplined Bills unravel in 24-10 loss to Giants 
Buffalo Bills quarterback Tyrod Taylor, left, avoids a sack by New York Giants safety Craig Dahl during the second half of an NFL football game, Sunday, Oct. 4, 2015, in Orchard Park, N.Y. (AP Photo/Gary Wiepert) Gary Wiepert Undisciplined Bills unravel in 24-10 loss to Giants 
New York Giants wide receiver Rueben Randle, left, is hit by Buffalo Bills cornerback Stephon Gilmore while scoring on a touchdown reception on a pass from quarterback Eli Manning during the first half of an NFL football game, Sunday, Oct. 4, 2015, in Orchard Park, N.Y. (AP Photo/Gary Wiepert) Gary Wiepert Undisciplined Bills unravel in 24-10 loss to Giants 
New York Giants running back Rashad Jennings, right, looks at Buffalo Bills cornerback Ronald Darby, left, as he scores on a touchdown run during the second half of an NFL football game, Sunday, Oct. 4, 2015, in Orchard Park, N.Y. (AP Photo/Gary Wiepert) Posted: Monday, October 5, 2015 2:08 am Undisciplined Bills unravel in 24-10 loss to Giants Associated Press | 0 comments 
ORCHARD PARK, N.Y. (AP) — Coach Rex Ryan was on the defensive after the Buffalo Bills unraveled to produce an undisciplined dud. 
"Hey, it's a free country. Write what you believe," Ryan told reporters.
